name: Gopls LSP
description: Go language server for Claude Code, providing code intelligence, refactoring, and analysis.
longDescription: Integrates `gopls` as a language server for Go files (`.go`). Provides code intelligence, refactoring, and static analysis including go-to-definition, find references, and diagnostics. Install via `go install golang.org/x/tools/gopls@latest` and ensure `$GOPATH/bin` is in your `PATH`.
